answerText: Barcelona[10] Barcelona's city council once provoked controversy by commissioning a nativity scene that did not include a caganer ("ka-ga-nay"), a traditional Catalan figurine of a peasant man performing this action.
heading: MUT |2015 | 4 | 20 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This city, the subject of a book-length "Homage" by Colm Toibin, was the center of the "Modernisme" architectural style of Lluís Domènech i Montaner and Antoni Gaudi.  [10] Name this home of Camp Nou, the capital of Catalonia and the second-largest city in Spain.
